attributes.title: This app made my wife leave me
attributes.review: Title says it all. I’m writing this review in a hollowed out tree because she took everything from me. Our house, our kids, our dog, and now she’s filing a lawsuit to take my tree away from me. Please Kathryn, it’s all I have.

attributes.title: This ain’t it
attributes.review: Initially I wanted to leave a 0 star review but I guess Trump also has apple working for him 😕 k. App is a sham, probably Chinese malware to steal our information.  I don’t trust this app with any of my information and it’s really not aesthetically pleasing.  To Trump: Kindly evaporate ☺️

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I am the biggest trump supporter in the nation so I was SO excited to get racist and homophobic notifications on my phone 🥰 I was disappointed when the app took several years to download and wiped all of my information off my phone.😡 so upsetting. Bernie 2024

attributes.title: Yes this app was trash
attributes.review: No this app is bad. Full of racist, sexist, homophobic content oopsies. The app is also broken won’t let me in. Bad bad app. Very bad. Must be deleted this app might as well not exist because it adds nothing to society or the virtual world. Please delete thank you.

attributes.title: crashed my phone!!
attributes.review: went to go see the news on our ✨fantastic✨ president and the app kept crashing. It also wiped data from my phone that i can never get back😡😡😡

attributes.title: completely disappointed:(
attributes.review: i expected to be wowed by the app being the drag diva herself, Donald J. Trump, is managing it... but it was SO UGLY AND BORING!! i nearly fell asleep from being so bored of the colors (red, white, and blue🤮). also let’s talk about how racist and sexist this fool is... so not cool... i hate the app and i hate the prez, BERNIE2020✨🧚🏻‍♀️🥰

attributes.title: App is bad :)
attributes.review:
This app is so slow and one of the weirdest cash grabs I’ve ever seen, I’m met with scammers and bots the second I open it up and the worst part is I keep seeing racist imagery and this orange character with a wig like a dead bird
1/5 would not recommend 
:))))))

attributes.title: Kept crashing!
attributes.review: Every time I opened the app after about 2 ‘United it would crash. :( I’ve re downloaded it 5 times and always run into the same issue.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my favorite guy in the world Mr. Trump😻 but when it downloaded it stole all of my information ⚰️and sent the pig cops 🐷to my house to kill my whole family🔪, the only reason i’m alive right now 😇is because my mom AOC 👑saved us. THIS APP ALMOST KILLED ME DHDHJSKSJSKS💀😾👺

attributes.title: ruined my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my #1 choice for the 2020 election and I have to say I am greatly disappointed to see that this app has been nonstop glitching and causing my phone to slow down.
